course_title: Introduction to the Theory of Music

001.comments: OPEN TO ALL STUDENTS. Not applicable to the BMUS or to BA Music majors or Music minors.

002.comments: Music Performance (Secondary): Preparatory Skills.  Preparatory training in fundamentals of music theory and aural skills. For BMUS students only, and only as required by School of Music admission procedures. Contact the School of Music Student Advisor for more information.2020W Format:  Students will attend two weekly 50-minute online classes on Mondays and Wednesdays at 10 am, and may drop in for online office hours Fridays at 10 am or other times as arranged with the instructor.

1W1.comments: Wait list for MUSC 103 001. Students will be moved to the class in order of DATE REGISTRATION on this waitlist, as/if space becomes available in the class.

description: Concepts of rhythm, pitch, timbre, and texture. Notation and aural recognition of rhythmic and pitch patterns. Basic principles of melody and form. This course is not applicable to the B.Mus.
